title: [GAMEPLAY] Varus E procs 4 W stacks
body:
if you auto a target right after using your E on them (the auto lands AFTER the E), the W stack applied by that auto will still be consumed by the E if varus has enough attack speed

i only tested this in practice mode against a target dummy and got it to work pretty much everytime. i tried firing my E when the target had 3 or 2 stacks of W and it worked in both cases. 

1 : start auto-attacking a target dummy
2 : fire your E right before your next auto is fired onto the target

its easy to reproduce and very consistent as the video shows. i wouldnt be surprised if you dont even need to auto the target before firing the E to reproduce that bug

replies.body:
This is intended and was even showcased in his spotlight.
